GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 04-04.03N 005-48.00E AT
   210836Z JAN. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
   CAUTION. REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   IMBPRC AND MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   COORD.NAVAREA2@SHOM.FR.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 281142Z JAN 20.
